archimate:WorkPackage.name: Foundation Platform Service deployment project
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
Platform deployment project
Goal:
Enable shared, secured capacity and connectivity services for Tietoevry Connect. This allows TE Connect to onboard services to in-country operated platform
- This project primary goal is to enable capacity and connectivity services on selected locations. Project will consume the design realized by Connectivity and Capacity Platform Development -project.
- Current estimation is that the platform needs to be deployed to several locations in Sweden, Norway and in Finland. Due to this, project is composed of multiple smaller sub-projects.
- Project is driven by Project Manager together with Service Architect, preferably the one who was assigned on the Platform Development project.
- Resources are mainly technical specialists who can install and configuring devices or systems based on the platform design. Project resourcing needs to be revised during development project.
Dependencies
- Connectivity and Capacity Platform Development has delivered the design for the new platform which supports in-country operations - Tietoevry Connect Portfolio Development has delivered the in-country organization so that the system can be transferred to in-country continuous services
Resourcing
This project requires extensive skills from various areas. The overall design is led by Service Architect, other roles required:
- Project Manager: Secures the resources and ensures the project is delivering
- Service Architect: Has overall understanding of the deployed system. This resource should be the same as in Platform Development as she/he has the best understanding of the platform design.
Technical resources:
x86 Technical Specialist Virtualization Technical Specialist Network Technical Specialist Automation Technical Specialist Windows Technical Specialist Unix Technical Specialist Monitoring Technical Specialist Data Center Technical SpecialistServiceNow Developer
